com.vividsolutions.jts.index.quadtree

Class Root

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vividsolutions.jts.index.quadtree.NodeBase
      • com.vividsolutions.jts.index.quadtree.Root
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Root
extends NodeBase
    QuadRoot is the root of a single Quadtree. It is centred at the origin, and does not have a defined extent.
    Version:
    1.7
